titleStmt.title: A treatise of morall phylosophie contaynyng the sayinges of the wyse. Gathered and Englyshed by Wyl[lia]m Baldwyn.
titleStmt.author: Baldwin, William, ca. 1518-1563?

publicationStmt.publisher: In Flete strete, at the signe of the Sunne, ouer agaynste the Conduyte, by Edwarde Whitchurche,
publicationStmt.date: the .xx. daye of Ianuarie, in the yeare of oure Lorde. 1547]

notesStmt.note: In four books; the first consists of biographies.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Sunne, ouer agaynste the Conduyte
